trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands used to reconcile changes made to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> with the associated database.
trans-unit.target: 單一資料表命令用來協調所做的變更會自動產生<xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>與相關聯的資料庫。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class that can only be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這是抽象類別，只可以被繼承。

trans-unit.source: The DbCommandBuilder class is provided for the convenience of provider writers creating their own command builders.
trans-unit.target: 提供建立自己的命令產生器的提供者撰寫人員的方便性，不論 DbCommandBuilder 類別。

trans-unit.source: By inheriting from this class, developers can implement provider specific behavior in their own code.
trans-unit.target: 藉由繼承自這個類別，開發人員可以在自己的程式碼中實作提供者特定的行為。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with the associated data source.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>協調所做的變更所需的 SQL 陳述式不會自動產生<xref:System.Data.DataSet>與相關聯的資料來源。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create a DbCommandBuilder object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 不過，您可以在其中建立 DbCommandBuilder 物件，如果您設定<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A><xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>屬性</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>自動產生 SQL 陳述式的單一資料表的更新

trans-unit.source: Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the DbCommandBuilder.
trans-unit.target: 然後，您未設定任何其他 SQL 陳述式會產生 DbCommandBuilder。

trans-unit.source: The DbCommandBuilder registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events whenever you set the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: DbCommandBuilder 註冊其本身的接聽程式為<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>事件，每當您設定<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: You can only associate one <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> or DbCommandBuilder object with each other at one time.
trans-unit.target: 您可以只將其中一個<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>或 DbCommandBuilder 物件與其他每一次。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the DbCommandBuilder uses the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式，使用 DbCommandBuilder<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>屬性，以自動擷取一組必要中繼資料。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> after the metadata has been retrieved (for example, after the first update), you should call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> method to update the metadata.
trans-unit.target: 如果您變更<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>擷取中繼資料 （例如，在第一次的更新） 之後，您應該呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>方法，以更新中繼資料。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `SelectCommand` must also return at least one primary key or unique column.
trans-unit.target: `SelectCommand`還必須傳回至少一個主索引鍵或唯一的資料行。

trans-unit.source: If none exist, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> exception is generated, and the commands are not generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果都不存在，<xref:System.InvalidOperationException>會產生例外狀況，並不會產生命令。</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The DbCommandBuilder also uses the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 也會使用 DbCommandBuilder <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Transaction%2A>屬性參考<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if any of these properties are modified, or if the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> itself is replaced.
trans-unit.target: 使用者應該呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>如果修改這些屬性，或如果<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>本身會被取代。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> properties retain their previous values.
trans-unit.target: 否則<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>屬性會保留其先前的值。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, the DbCommandBuilder is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: 如果您呼叫<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>，會解除關聯 DbCommandBuilder <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>，以及所產生的命令不會再使用。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a class that inherits from the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化繼承自一個類別的新執行個體<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Allows the provider implementation of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class to handle additional parameter properties.
trans-unit.target: 允許的提供者實作<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>類別來處理額外的參數屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method allows an implementation of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> class to handle provider-specific parameter properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓實作<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>類別來處理提供者特有的參數屬性。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"></xref> to which the additional modifications are applied.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbParameter"> </xref>套用其他修改。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"></xref> from the schema table provided by <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetSchemaTable*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.DataRow"> </xref> <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetSchemaTable*>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataReader.GetSchemaTable*>所提供的結構描述資料表中

trans-unit.source: The type of command being generated; INSERT, UPDATE or DELETE.
trans-unit.target: 命令所產生的類型插入、 更新或刪除。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the parameter is part of the update or delete WHERE clause, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it is part of the insert or update values.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果參數是 update 或 delete WHERE 子句的一部分<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>如果它是 insert 或 update 值的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref>執行個體<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a string used as the catalog separator for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 設定或取得字串，做為執行個體的目錄分隔符號<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the catalog separator for use with an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 字串，表示執行個體搭配使用的目錄分隔符號<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Specifies which <xref href="System.Data.ConflictOption"></xref> is to be used by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指定哪一個<xref href="System.Data.ConflictOption"></xref>所使用的是<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns one of the <xref href="System.Data.ConflictOption"></xref> values describing the behavior of this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的其中一個<xref href="System.Data.ConflictOption"></xref>值描述的行為<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref> object for which Transact-SQL statements are automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref>的 TRANSACT-SQL 陳述式就會自動產生的物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>自己註冊為接聽程式<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating>產生的事件<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>這個屬性中指定。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立的新執行個體<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>，任何現有<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>與此相關聯<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>釋放。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 所使用的 unmanaged 的資源釋出<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>並選擇性釋放 managed 的資源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A> method and the `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫公用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>方法和`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected Dispose method with the disposing parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>disposing 參數設為叫用受保護的 Dispose 方法`true`。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: `Finalize`叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> references.
trans-unit.target: 當`disposing`參數是`true`，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>參考。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A> method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會叫用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>每個參考物件的方法。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示釋放 managed 和 unmanaged 資源，<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>表示只釋放 unmanaged 的資源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>執行刪除資料來源所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetDeleteCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式才能使用 GetDeleteCommand 方法進行資訊或疑難排解因為它會傳回<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>要執行的物件。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetDeleteCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 GetDeleteCommand 做為基礎的已修改的命令。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetDeleteCommand and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可能會呼叫 GetDeleteCommand 和修改命令文字，並接著<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>上明確設定，

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確地呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>陳述式以任何方式變更時。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetDeleteCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 否則，GetDeleteCommand 將仍會使用從先前的陳述式，這可能不正確的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetDeleteCommand.
trans-unit.target: SQL 陳述式是第一個應用程式進行呼叫時產生<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>或 GetDeleteCommand。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>執行刪除所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions at the data source, optionally using columns for parameter names.
trans-unit.target: 取得自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>執行刪除資料來源，並選擇性地使用資料行的參數名稱所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>方法資訊或疑難排解的考量，因為它會傳回<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>要執行的物件。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>做為基礎的已修改的命令。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>和修改命令文字，然後明確地設定，於<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確地呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>陳述式以任何方式變更時。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>仍會使用從先前的陳述式，這可能不正確的資訊。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: SQL 陳述式是第一個應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>或<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A></xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>時產生

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`true`如`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>來產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 符合下列條件時，才會成功:-<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>已指定，且其長度等於或大於產生的參數名稱。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -產生的參數名稱符合指定準則<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>規則運算式。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>指定。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，產生盡可能符合資料行名稱的參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，產生@p1， @p2，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>執行刪除所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>執行插入資料來源所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetInsertCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式才能使用 GetInsertCommand 方法進行資訊或疑難排解因為它會傳回的文字<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>要執行的物件。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetInsertCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 GetInsertCommand 做為基礎的已修改的命令。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetInsertCommand and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，您可能會呼叫 GetInsertCommand 和修改命令文字，並接著<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>上明確設定，

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確地呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>陳述式以任何方式變更時。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetInsertCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 否則，GetInsertCommand 將仍會使用從先前的陳述式，這可能不正確的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetInsertCommand.
trans-unit.target: SQL 陳述式是第一個應用程式進行呼叫時產生<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>或 GetInsertCommand。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>執行插入所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions at the data source, optionally using columns for parameter names.
trans-unit.target: 取得自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>執行插入，在資料來源，並選擇性地使用資料行的參數名稱所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式可以使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>方法資訊或疑難排解的考量，因為它會傳回的文字<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>要執行的物件。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>做為基礎的已修改的命令。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>和修改命令文字，然後明確地設定，於<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確地呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>陳述式以任何方式變更時。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>仍會使用從先前的陳述式，這可能不正確的資訊。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated either when the application calls <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: SQL 陳述式是第一個應用程式呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>或<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A></xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>時產生

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: 產生的參數名稱時的預設行為是使用@p1， @p2，依此類推的各種不同的參數。

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter allows you to force the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞`true`如`useColumnsForParameterNames`參數可讓您強制<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>來產生改為根據的資料行名稱的參數。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Generation of the parameters based on column names succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 根據資料行名稱的參數產生在符合下列條件時，才會成功:-<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>已指定，且其長度等於或大於產生的參數名稱。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -產生的參數名稱符合指定準則<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>規則運算式。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A<xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>指定。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>，產生盡可能符合資料行名稱的參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，產生@p1， @p2，依此類推。

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>執行插入所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the specified parameter in the format of @p*#*.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定之參數的名稱，格式為@p * # *。

trans-unit.source: Use when building a custom command builder.
trans-unit.target: 當建置自訂的命令產生器時使用。

trans-unit.source: The number to be included as part of the parameter's name..
trans-unit.target: 數字，要包含在參數的名稱...

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter with the specified number appended as part of the parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 具有指定之數字附加做為參數名稱的一部分的參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the full parameter name, given the partial parameter name.
trans-unit.target: 傳回完整的參數名稱，在給定的部分參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: The partial name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 部分參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The full parameter name corresponding to the partial parameter name requested.
trans-unit.target: 完整的參數名稱，對應到要求的部分參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the placeholder for the parameter in the associated SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的 SQL 陳述式中傳回參數的預留位置。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use by provider writers building a custom command builder.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅供使用的提供者撰寫人員建置自訂的命令產生器。

trans-unit.source: The number to be included as part of the parameter's name.
trans-unit.target: 此數字，為參數的名稱的一部分。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter with the specified number appended.
trans-unit.target: 附加指定的數字參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Returns the schema table for the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的結構描述資料表<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use by provider writers building a custom command builder.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅供使用的提供者撰寫人員建置自訂的命令產生器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> for which to retrieve the corresponding schema table.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref>為其擷取對應的結構描述資料表。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> that represents the schema for the specific <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref>代表特定的結構描述<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates at the data source.
trans-unit.target: 取得自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>執行更新資料來源所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetUpdateCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式才能使用 GetUpdateCommand 方法進行資訊或疑難排解因為它會傳回<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>要執行的物件。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetUpdateCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用 GetUpdateCommand 做為基礎的已修改的命令。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetUpdateCommand and modify the command text, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.target: 第一次產生 SQL 陳述式之後，應用程式必須明確地呼叫<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>陳述式以任何方式變更時。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetUpdateCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: 否則，GetUpdateCommand 將仍會使用從先前的陳述式，這可能不正確的資訊。

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: 自動產生<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>執行更新所需的物件。

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandTimeout*>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Transaction*>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType*>, and <xref href="System.Data.UpdateRowSource"></xref> properties on the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Resets the <>*>, <>*>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType*>, and <xref href="System.Data.UpdateRowSource"></xref> properties on the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandType*>

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use by provider writers building a custom command builder.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅供使用的提供者撰寫人員建置自訂的命令產生器。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> to be used by the command builder for the corresponding insert, update, or delete command.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref>用於命令產生器所對應的插入、 更新或刪除命令。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> instance to use for each insert, update, or delete operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref>来用於每個插入、 更新或刪除作業的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Passing a null value allows the InitializeCommand method to create a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object based on the Select command associated with the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 傳遞 null 值可讓 InitializeCommand 方法建立<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref>物件會根據選取的命令相關聯<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier, including properly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 提供未加引號識別項在正確的類別目錄的情況下，傳回的正確加上引號的識別碼，其中包含未正確逸出識別項中的任何內嵌的引號的形式。

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: 原始的不具引號識別項。

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 引號識別項的版本。

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are properly escaped.
trans-unit.target: 內嵌的引號識別碼內的正確逸出。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the beginning character or characters to use when specifying database objects (for example, tables or columns) whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定指定資料庫物件 （例如，資料表或資料行） 名稱包含字元，例如空格或語彙的基元時所要使用的開頭字元。

trans-unit.source: Some data sources may have objects that can contain characters such as spaces, commas, and semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 某些資料來源可能會有物件可以包含字元，例如空格、 逗號和分號。

trans-unit.source: To accommodate this capability, use the QuotePrefix and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A> properties to specify delimiters such as a left bracket and a right bracket to encapsulate the object name.
trans-unit.target: 若要因應這項功能，請使用 QuotePrefix 和<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A>屬性，以指定分隔符號，例如左括號與右括號，將封裝的物件名稱。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you cannot change the QuotePrefix or <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A> properties after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 雖然您無法變更 QuotePrefix 或<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A>內容之後插入、 更新或刪除命令產生後，您可以變更其設定之後呼叫`Update`方法<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix%2A>

trans-unit.source: The beginning character or characters to use.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用的開頭字元。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated.
trans-unit.target: 產生 insert、 update 或 delete 命令之後，就無法變更這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending character or characters to use when specifying database objects (for example, tables or columns) whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定結束的指定資料庫物件 （例如，資料表或資料行） 名稱包含字元，例如空格或語彙的基元時所要使用的字元。

trans-unit.source: Some data sources may have objects that can contain characters such as spaces, commas, and semicolons.
trans-unit.target: 某些資料來源可能會有物件可以包含字元，例如空格、 逗號和分號。

trans-unit.source: To accommodate this capability, use the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A> and QuoteSuffix properties to specify delimiters such as a left bracket and a right bracket to encapsulate the object name.
trans-unit.target: 若要因應這項功能，請使用<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A>和 QuoteSuffix 屬性，以指定分隔符號，例如左括號與右括號，將封裝的物件名稱。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Although you cannot change the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A> or QuoteSuffix properties after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated, you can change their settings after calling the `Update` method of a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 雖然您無法變更<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A>或 QuoteSuffix 屬性之後插入、 更新或刪除命令產生後，您可以變更其設定之後呼叫`Update`方法<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: The ending character or characters to use.
trans-unit.target: 結束的字元或若要使用的字元。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串。

trans-unit.source: Clears the commands associated with this <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 清除與此相關聯的命令<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calling the RefreshSchema method effectively removes all the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> objects referred to by the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 有效地呼叫 RefreshSchema 方法移除所有<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>所參考物件<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>， <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>，和<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>

trans-unit.source: Adds an event handler for the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 加入事件處理常式<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"></xref> instance containing information about the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.RowUpdatingEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件的相關資訊的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要用於結構描述識別項與任何其他識別項之間的分隔符號字元。

trans-unit.source: Generally, database servers indicate the schema for an identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，資料庫伺服器會藉由使用某些字元的識別項分隔的結構描述名稱，表示識別項的結構描述。

trans-unit.source: For example, SQL Server uses a colon, creating complete identifiers such as **Person:CustomerName**, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 例如，SQL Server 會使用冒號，例如建立完整的識別元**人員︰ CustomerName**，其中"Person"是結構描述名稱，而"CustomerName"為識別項。

trans-unit.source: Setting this property allows developers to modify this behavior.
trans-unit.target: 設定這個屬性可讓開發人員修改此行為。

trans-unit.source: The character to be used as the schema separator.
trans-unit.target: 要用做為結構描述分隔符號的字元。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether all column values in an update statement are included or only changed ones.
trans-unit.target: 指定 update 陳述式中的所有資料行值是否內含或只有已變更的。

trans-unit.source: The UPDATE statement generated by a <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> can include update information about all the columns, or it can include information only about those columns whose values have changed.
trans-unit.target: UPDATE 陳述式所產生<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>可以包含更新的相關資訊的資料行，或它可以包含的值已變更，這些資料行的相關資訊。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: Setting the SetAllValues property to `true` causes the generated UPDATE statement to include all the columns, whether their values have changed or not.
trans-unit.target: SetAllValues 屬性設定為`true`會導致產生的 UPDATE 陳述式包含的資料行，不論是否已變更其值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the UPDATE statement generated by the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> includes all columns; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if it includes only changed columns.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 UPDATE 陳述式所產生<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>包括所有資料行;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果它包含只變更資料行。

trans-unit.source: Registers the <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref> to handle the <xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 註冊<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder"></xref>處理<xref href="System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is intended for use by provider writers building a custom command builder.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法僅供使用的提供者撰寫人員建置自訂的命令產生器。

trans-unit.source: When a new <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter> is added to the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>, it is registered for the DbDataAdapter's **RowUpdating** event.
trans-unit.target: 當新<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>加入至<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>，也會註冊為 DbDataAdapter **RowUpdating**事件。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: If this method is called again with the same <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>, the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> is unregistered for that DbDataAdapter's **RowUpdating** event.
trans-unit.target: 如果具有相同再次呼叫此方法<xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>、<xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder>是取消登錄該 DbDataAdapter **RowUpdating**事件。</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"></xref> to be used for the update.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter"> </xref>用於更新。

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier, including properly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: 提供引號識別項，會傳回不具引號的正確格式，該識別項，包括不逸出任何內嵌的引號識別項中。

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: 會將移除其內嵌的引號識別項。

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly un-escaped.
trans-unit.target: 不具引號的識別碼，與正確未逸出的內嵌引號。
